spec_data.Name: gtksourceviewmm
spec_data.Description:
gtksourceviewmm is a C++ wrapper for the gtksourceview widget
library. It offers all the power of gtksourceview with an interface
familiar to c++ developers, including users of the gtkmm library
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 10:01:24 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A C++ wrapper for the gtksourceview widget library
